AREIT.PA.summary: Altareit SCA operates as a real estate development company in France. The company develops residential properties, such as residential units and serviced residences; and mixed-use projects and business properties. Altareit SCA was incorporated in 1955 and is headquartered in Paris, France.

CAPLI.PA.summary: Groupe Capelli develops, manages, and operates real estate properties in France, Switzerland, and Luxembourg. The company's property portfolio includes lands, houses, apartments, duplex villas, rehabilitations, and offices. It is also involved in social housing and real estate investment activities. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Champagne-au-Mont-d'Or, France.

CP0.SG.summary: Groupe Capelli develops, manages, and operates real estate properties in France, Switzerland, and Luxembourg. The company's property portfolio includes lands, houses, apartments, duplex villas, rehabilitations, and offices. It is also involved in social housing and real estate investment activities. The company was founded in 1976 and is based in Champagne-au-Mont-d'Or, France.

MLLCB.PA.summary: Les Constructeurs Du Bois designs and constructs office, industrial, and residential buildings in France. The company develops timber real estate projects in the Grand Est. It focuses on two segments, Medical Homes and Senior Residences. The company designs and manages wood buildings. Les Constructeurs Du Bois was founded in 2010 and is based in Epinal, France.
